verses.verse: Elihu<WH453> also proceeded,<WH3254> and said,<WH559>
Suffer<WH3803> me a little,<WH2191> and I will show<WH2331> you that I have yet<WH5750> to speak<WH4405> on God's<WH433> behalf.
I will fetch<WH5375> my knowledge<WH1843> from afar,<WH7350> and will ascribe<WH5414> righteousness<WH6664> to my Maker.<WH6466>
For truly<WH551> my words<WH4405> shall not be false:<WH8267> he that is perfect<WH8549> in knowledge<WH1844> is with you.
Behold,<WH2005> God<WH410> is mighty,<WH3524> and despises<WH3988> not any: he is mighty<WH3524> in strength<WH3581> and wisdom.<WH3820>
He preserves<WH2421> not the life<WH2421> of the wicked:<WH7563> but gives<WH5414> right<WH4941> to the poor.<WH6041>

He withdraws<WH1639> not his eyes<WH5869> from the righteous:<WH6662> but with kings<WH4428> are they on the throne;<WH3678> yes, he does establish<WH3427> them for ever,<WH5331> and they are exalted.<WH1361>
And if<WH518> they be bound<WH631> in fetters,<WH2131> and be held<WH3920> in cords<WH2256> of affliction;<WH6040>
Then he shows<WH5046> them their work,<WH6467> and their transgressions<WH6588> that they have exceeded.<WH1396>
He opens<WH1540> also their ear<WH241> to discipline,<WH4148> and commands<WH559> that they return<WH7725> from iniquity.<WH205>
If<WH518> they obey<WH8085> and serve<WH5647> him, they shall spend<WH3615> their days<WH3117> in prosperity,<WH2896> and their years<WH8141> in pleasures.<WH5273>
But if<WH518> they obey<WH8085> not, they shall perish<WH5674> by the sword,<WH7973> and they shall die<WH1478> without<WH1097> knowledge.<WH1847>
But the hypocrites<WH2611> in heart<WH3820> heap<WH7760> up wrath:<WH639> they cry<WH7768> not when<WH3588> he binds<WH631> them.
They die<WH4191> in youth,<WH5290> and their life<WH2416> is among the unclean.<WH6945>
He delivers<WH2502> the poor<WH6041> in his affliction,<WH6040> and opens<WH1540> their ears<WH241> in oppression.<WH3906>

Even so would he have removed<WH5496> you out of the strait<WH6862> into a broad<WH7338> place, where there is no<WH3808> narrow place;<WH4164> and that which should be set<WH5183> on your table<WH7979> should be full<WH4390> of fatness.<WH1880>
But you have fulfilled<WH4390> the judgment<WH1779> of the wicked:<WH7563> judgment<WH1779> and justice<WH4941> take<WH8551> hold<WH8551> on you.
Because<WH3588> there is wrath,<WH2534> beware lest<WH6435> he take<WH5496> you away<WH5496> with his stroke:<WH5607> then a great<WH7227> ransom<WH3724> cannot<WH3808> deliver<WH5186> you.
Will he esteem<WH6186> your riches?<WH7769> no,<WH3808> not gold,<WH1222> nor<WH3808> all<WH3605> the forces<WH3981> of strength.<WH3581>
Desire<WH7602> not the night,<WH3915> when people<WH5971> are cut<WH5927> off in their place.<WH8478>
Take heed,<WH8104> regard<WH6437> not iniquity:<WH205> for this<WH2088> have you chosen<WH970> rather than affliction.<WH6040>
Behold,<WH2005> God<WH410> exalts<WH7682> by his power:<WH3581> who<WH4310> teaches<WH3384> like<WH3644> him?
Who<WH4310> has enjoined<WH6485> him his way?<WH1870> or who<WH4310> can say,<WH559> You have worked<WH6466> iniquity?<WH5766>
Remember<WH2142> that you magnify<WH7679> his work,<WH6467> which<WH834> men<WH582> behold.<WH7891>
Every<WH3605> man<WH120> may see<WH2372> it; man<WH582> may behold<WH5027> it afar<WH7350> off.
Behold,<WH2005> God<WH410> is great,<WH7689> and we know<WH3045> him not, neither<WH3808> can the number<WH4557> of his years<WH8141> be searched<WH2714> out.
For he makes small<WH1639> the drops<WH5197> of water:<WH4325> they pour<WH2212> down rain<WH4306> according to the vapor<WH108> thereof:
Which<WH834> the clouds<WH7834> do drop<WH5140> and distil<WH7491> on man<WH120> abundantly.<WH7227>
Also<WH637> can any understand<WH995> the spreading<WH4666> of the clouds,<WH5645> or the noise<WH8663> of his tabernacle?<WH5521>
Behold,<WH2005> he spreads<WH6566> his light<WH216> on it, and covers<WH3680> the bottom<WH8328> of the sea.<WH3220>
For by them judges<WH1777> he the people;<WH5971> he gives<WH5414> meat<WH400> in abundance.<WH4342>
With clouds<WH3709> he covers<WH3680> the light;<WH216> and commands<WH6680> it not to shine by the cloud that comes<WH6293> between.<WH6293>
The noise<WH7452> thereof shows<WH5046> concerning<WH5921> it, the cattle<WH4735> also<WH637> concerning<WH5921> the vapor.<WH5927>
